common.comingSoon: This feature will be available in a future update.

auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign In
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up

errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number including area code
errors.dobInvalid: Please enter a valid date of birth (MM/DD/YYYY)
errors.termsRequired: You must agree to the terms and conditions

home.addBiometrics: Add your biometric data to personalize triage and doctor insights.
home.startFirstConsultation: Start a consultation to get diagnosed by our AI and doctors

triage.title: AI Health Triage
triage.disclaimer: Not a diagnosis. Your doctor will review this information.
triage.nurseSpeaking: Nurse Sarah is speaking... Tap to stop
triage.voiceUnavailableMessage: Speech recognition requires a development build. Switching to text mode.
triage.micPermissionMessage: Please allow microphone access to use voice input.
triage.skipMessage: You can skip the AI triage and go directly to the waiting room. The doctor will have less context about your symptoms.

waitingRoom.title: Waiting Room
waitingRoom.subtitle: Your triage is complete. A doctor will be with you shortly.
waitingRoom.insightsDescription: Your symptoms have been analyzed. The doctor will review your AI-generated health insights before the consultation.
waitingRoom.secureDescription: Your video consultation is end-to-end encrypted and HIPAA compliant.

insights.title: AI Health Insights
insights.subtitle: Generated from your symptoms and health data
insights.disclaimer: AI-Assisted Analysis â€” Not a Medical Diagnosis
insights.disclaimerText: This information helps your doctor understand your symptoms. It is NOT a medical diagnosis. Only a licensed healthcare provider can diagnose and treat medical conditions.
insights.conditionsDisclaimer: These are possibilities, not diagnoses. Only a doctor can provide a diagnosis.
insights.savedMessage: Your health insights have been saved. You can review them later from the home screen.

history.title: Consultation History
history.noConsultationsDescription: Your past consultations will appear here after you complete a video call with a doctor.

profile.medicalHistoryMessage: View your past consultation records, diagnoses, and treatment history. Coming soon in our next update!
profile.medicationsMessage: Track your current medications, dosages, and schedules. Coming soon in our next update!
profile.allergiesMessage: Manage your allergy information so doctors are always informed. Coming soon in our next update!
profile.settingsMessage: Configure app preferences, notifications, and privacy settings. Coming soon in our next update!

doctor.noPatientsSubtext: Patients will appear here after completing triage
doctor.noActiveCallMessage: This patient does not have an active video call waiting. They need to complete triage first.
doctor.noActiveCallForPatient: This patient does not have an active waiting room. Ask the patient to start/rejoin consultation first.
doctor.availabilityMessage: Set your consultation hours and manage appointment slots. Coming soon in our next update!
doctor.credentialsMessage: Manage your medical credentials, certifications, and license details. Coming soon in our next update!
doctor.endConsultationConfirm: Are you sure you want to end this consultation?
doctor.dxAddedToNotes: {{diagnosis}} added to consultation notes as a possible cause.
doctor.aiMedicationWarning: AI medication suggestions are for reference only. Always verify indications, dosage, and contraindications before prescribing.
doctor.noMedicationSuggestions: No medication suggestions yet. Refresh Clinical Assist or continue the consultation.
doctor.noBiometricData: No biometric data available for this patient.
doctor.noTriageTranscript: No triage transcript available for this patient.
doctor.noAiInsights: No AI insights available for this patient. Triage may not have been completed.
doctor.tapConditionHint: Tap a condition to add it as a diagnostic
doctor.noPreviousConsultations: No previous consultations found for this patient.
doctor.generalNotesPlaceholder: Chief complaint, key observations, clinical findings...
doctor.useDxHint: Use "Use as Dx" in the Dx tab to add diagnoses here.
doctor.useRxHint: Use "Use for Rx" in the Meds tab to add prescriptions here.
doctor.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Follow-up instructions, red flags, patient instructions...
doctor.reportReady: Report ready â€” tap the report icon to view.
doctor.reportFailed: Auto-report failed. Generate manually using the report icon.
doctor.noTranscriptYet: No conversation recorded yet. Tap "Start Listening" to begin.

welcome.title: Vitali
welcome.subtitle: Vitali Intelligent Health
welcome.feature1Description: Smart symptom analysis powered by AI

emergency.callNow: This sounds like it could be a medical emergency. Please call 911 or go to the nearest emergency room immediately.
emergency.crisisLine: If you are having thoughts of self-harm, please call the 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline (call or text 988).
